column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The deep dish itself was beautiful. The Malnati's is basically a thick layer of mozz cheese
column3: and tomato sauce. The sausage is flavorful and the tomato sauce was chunky! The Lou's is perfect if you like a more vegetarian option- lots of spinach at the base
column7: and cheddar. I liked the amount of toppings in both BUT they were way too cheesy for me. It was my first time having deep dish so it might be typical
column8: but I'd be wary if you also don't like cheese. Lastly
column9: the crust had a good crunch!
